content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the enclosure movement?

choices.label: A system of high tariffs erected by Philip II of Spain
A military maneuver developed by Henry V of England
The fencing of common farmland in England for private use
A network of improved roads and bridges
The erection of a fortified line between France and Germany

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
